Posts.Content: Im having my first EC tomorrow and also going to cold cap (determined to stick it out!) I am trying to remind myself that it’s just drugs... I’m told it’s really doable and unfortunately most people who are fine don’t blog (getting on with their lives)  So I’m hoping that we can be a month of positive blogs! And that we all find it’s better than we think!!  Side effects can be dealt with I just think it’s the unknown.. it’s awful!  When I think back to when I was first diagnosed that was horrid... the waiting!!! But now I look back and think wow.. that’s done (Dx feb) and  feels a bit like a distant memory!  So I’m hoping this will be the same!! Either way tomorrow will be done and for me 1/4 ofcth course done too.. so in a bizarre way looking forward to it!!  Let me know how you go!! Fingers crossed we will be fine!!!!!
Posts.Title: April diagnosis group

Posts.Content: How do I join this group.. starting my chemo tomorrow and hoping to seek kindred spirits! X
Posts.Title: *** May 2018 Breast Cancer Chemo Club ***
